      • registerClient

        public static void registerClient(double[] totalValuePaid,
                                  double[] kilosTransported,
                                  int[] category,
                                  java.lang.String[] nameClient,
                                  java.lang.String[] registerNumber,
                                  java.lang.String[] expeditionDate)
        Name of the method: registerClient
        This method allows the user to register clients
        Parameters:
        totalValuePaid - Is the total value that the client has paid in previous loads
        kilosTransported - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that the client has transported.
        category - Is the category of the client. This can be NORMAL, SILVER, GOLD or PLATINUM.
        nameClient - Is the name of the client
        registerNumber - Is the commercial register number of the client
        expeditionDate - Is the expedition date of the client's commercial register

      • loadTheShip

        public static void loadTheShip(java.lang.String ship1,
                               java.lang.String ship2,
                               int numberOfLoads,
                               int stop,
                               double netWeight,
                               int add,
                               int[] typeLoad,
                               int[] owner,
                               int[] weightBox,
                               int[] numberOfBoxes,
                               double[] weightLoad,
                               java.lang.String[] nameClient)
        Name of the method: loadTheShip
        This method allows the user to load the ship.
        Parameters:
        ship1 - Means if the ship complies with the condition 1.
        ship2 - Means if the ship complies with the condition 2.
        numberOfLoads - Is the number of loads that will be transported.
        stop - Allows to stop adding loads
        netWeight - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that will be transported by the ship.
        add - Means if the user wants to add another load to the ship.
        typeLoad - Is the type of the load. This can be DANGEROUS, PERISHABLE or NO PERISHABLE.
        owner - Is the owner of the load.
        weightBox - Is the weight of each box.
        numberOfBoxes - Is the number of boxes that the load contains.
        weightLoad - Is the net weight of the load.
        nameClient - Is the name of the client

      • showIfTheshipCanSail

        public static void showIfTheshipCanSail(java.lang.String ship1,
                                        java.lang.String ship2,
                                        int stop,
                                        int numberOfLoads,
                                        double netWeight,
                                        int[] typeLoad)
        Name of the method: showIfTheshipCanSail
        This method determinate if the ship can get sail considering if the ship complies with the necessary conditions to sail Condition 1: The ship has the minimum weight or number of loads to set sail Condition 2: The ship complies with the sanitation rules
        Parameters:
        ship1 - Means if the ship complies with the condition 1 to sail.
        ship2 - Means if the ship complies with the condition 2 to sail.
        stop - Allows to stop adding loads.
        numberOfLoads - Is the number of loads that will be transported.
        netWeight - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that will be transported by the ship.
        typeLoad - Is the type of the load. This can be DANGEROUS, PERISHABLE or NO PERISHABLE.

      • determinateDiscount

        public static void determinateDiscount(int numberOfLoads,
                                       int[] typeLoad,
                                       int[] owner,
                                       double[] discount,
                                       int[] category)
        Name of the method: determinateDiscount This method calculates the value of the discount that will be applied to each load
        Parameters:
        numberOfLoads - Is the number of loads that will be transported.
        typeLoad - Is the type of the load. This can be DANGEROUS, PERISHABLE or NO PERISHABLE.
        owner - Is the owner of the load.
        discount - Is the value of the discount that will be applied to each load
        category - Is the category of the client. This can be NORMAL, SILVER, GOLD or PLATINUM.

      • showTotalValue

        public static void showTotalValue(int[] owner,
                                  java.lang.String[] nameClient,
                                  double[] totalValue,
                                  int numberOfLoads,
                                  double[] weightLoad,
                                  double[] discount,
                                  int[] typeLoad)
        Name of the method: showTotalValue This method shows the total value that the client will pay to transport the load
        Parameters:
        owner - Is the owner of the load.
        nameClient - Is the name of the client.
        totalValue - Is the total value that the client will pay for the load.
        numberOfLoads - Is the number of loads that will be transported.
        weightLoad - Is the net weight of the load.
        discount - Is the value of the discount that will be applied to each load.
        typeLoad - Is the type of the load. This can be DANGEROUS, PERISHABLE or NO PERISHABLE.

      • unloadTheShip

        public static void unloadTheShip(double[] discount,
                                 double[] totalValue,
                                 java.lang.String ship1,
                                 java.lang.String ship2,
                                 int numberOfLoads,
                                 int stop,
                                 double netWeight,
                                 int[] typeLoad,
                                 int[] owner,
                                 int[] weightBox,
                                 int[] numberOfBoxes,
                                 double[] weightLoad)
        Name of the method:unloadTheShip
        This method allows the user to unload the ship All the variables will return to their initial value
        Parameters:
        discount - Is the value of the discount that will be applied to each load.
        totalValue - Is the total value that the client will pay for the load.
        ship1 - Means if the ship complies with the condition 1 to sail.
        ship2 - Means if the ship complies with the condition 2 to sail.
        numberOfLoads - Is the number of loads that will be transported.
        stop - Allows to stop adding loads.
        netWeight - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that will be transported by the ship.
        typeLoad - Is the type of the load. This can be DANGEROUS, PERISHABLE or NO PERISHABLE.
        owner - Is the owner of the load.
        weightBox - Is the weight of each box.
        numberOfBoxes - Is the number of boxes that the load contains.
        weightLoad - Is the net weight of the load.

      • saveAccumulated

        public static void saveAccumulated(int numberOfLoads,
                                   double[] kilosTransported,
                                   double[] totalValuePaid,
                                   double[] weightLoad,
                                   double[] totalValue,
                                   int[] owner)
        Name of the method: saveAccumulated
        This method saves the accumulated of kilos tranported and money paid by the client
        Parameters:
        numberOfLoads - Is the number of loads that will be transported.
        kilosTransported - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that the client has transported.
        totalValuePaid - Is the total value that the client has paid in previous loads
        weightLoad - Is the net weight of the load.
        totalValue - Is the total value that the client will pay for the load.
        owner - Is the owner of the load.

      • updateCategories

        public static void updateCategories(java.lang.String[] categoryName,
                                    int[] category,
                                    java.lang.String[] nameClient,
                                    double[] kilosTransported,
                                    double[] totalValuePaid)
        Name of the method: updateCategories
        This method allows the user to update the categories of the client
        Parameters:
        categoryName - Is the name of the categories. This can be "NORMAL", "SILVER", "GOLD" or "PLATINUM".
        category - Is the category of the client.
        nameClient - Is the name of the client.
        kilosTransported - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that the client has transported.
        totalValuePaid - Is the total value that the client has paid in previous loads

      • showData

        public static void showData(java.lang.String[] categoryName,
                            double[] totalValuePaid,
                            double[] kilosTransported,
                            int[] category,
                            java.lang.String[] nameClient,
                            java.lang.String[] registerNumber,
                            java.lang.String[] expeditionDate)
        Name of the method: showData
        This method shows the client's data
        Parameters:
        categoryName - Is the name of the categories. This can be "NORMAL", "SILVER", "GOLD" or "PLATINUM".
        totalValuePaid - Is the total value that the client has paid in previous loads
        kilosTransported - Is the sum of the weight of all the loads that the client has transported.
        category - Is the category of the client.
        nameClient - Is the name of the client.
        registerNumber - Is the commercial register number of the client
        expeditionDate - Is the expedition date of the client's commercial register
